DOC.brief_summary: Climbing high altitude tolerate hypoxic environment require specific physiological adaptation . Large intersubjects difference exist regard ability adapt high altitude hypoxia . The present study aim characterise physiological response hypoxia group elite climber comparison sea level athlete . We hypothesise elite climber would show well physiological response hypoxia preserve performance compare sea level .
DOC.criteria: Age 18 40 Member national high altitude climb group Any diseases incompatible hypoxic exposure , exercise testing Pregnancy
